One particular preferred approach for using RSI in forex trading is by identifying divergence involving the value action and also the RSI indicator. Divergence takes place when the cost of a forex pair moves in the opposite course with the RSI. As an example, if the price is creating decreased lows, however the RSI is making increased lows, it implies a possible bullish reversal.
